CHAT.comment: UNITED STATES, Petitioner v. MARTIN O'BRIEN AND ARTHUR BURGESS.
The above-entitled matter came on for oral argument before the Supreme Court of the United States at 11:14 a.m.
ORAL ARGUMENT OF BENJAMIN HORWICH ON BEHALF OF THE PETITIONER
ORAL ARGUMENT OF JEFFREY L. FISHER ON BEHALF OF THE RESPONDENTS
REBUTTAL ARGUMENT OF BENJAMIN HORWICH ON BEHALF OF THE PETITIONER
(Whereupon, at 12:05 p.m., the case in the above-entitled matter was submitted.)
